directions: [["Preheat oven to 425 degrees"],["Combine Roasting Spices ingredients in a bowl and whisk. Add Roasting Vegetables and toss until well coated. Spread mixture on a rimmed baking sheet and roast on the top oven rack until golden brown, 30 to 40 minutes, stirring once or twice"],["In a bowl, whisk together all Tahini Sauce ingredients except tahini, let sit for a minute or two to mellow the garlic"],["Whisk in tahini. Whisk in some ice water 1 tablespoon at a time until the sauce is smooth and thin enough to drizzle"],["When vegetables are cooked, serve on warmed pita or flatbread and drizzle with tahini sauce. Other suggested toppings are chopped fresh parsley, tomato, cucumber, and olives."],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
